column6:
After a disastrous capture mission, the Thunderbolts have troubled down-time, dealing with the split between the public projection of them as heroes and the reality of their incarceration. Meanwhile, Norman Osborn is studying a list of potential new targets, and the stress seems to be getting to him. Featuring a variant cover by Young Guns Reloaded artist Pasqual Ferry!,2007,3
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Rainier Beredo | penciller:Mike Deodato | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | writer:Warren Ellis | letterer:Richard Starkings
